item.title: Five benefits of legalising drugs that may change your perspective
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: Legalising drugs would make drug use safer, but the bigger impact of moving to a regulated drug market is that it would defy racism, reduce chaos and violence and make us wealthier.
